roleset.name: go up very fast, move like a rocket
roleset.note: ROCKET-V NOTES: Might take a possible directional, as in "rocket up(wards)". That canbe an ArgM-DIR. (from rocket.01-v)

role.descr: medium, attribute rocketing rather than whole patient

example.name: with other args
example.text: Weisfield's rocketed 9 1/2 to 39 after the jewelry store operator said it is in preliminary discussions, with a party it wouldn't identify, regarding the possible acquisition of the company.
example.arg: after the jewelry store operator said it is in preliminary discussions, with a party it wouldn't identify, regarding the possible acquisition of the company
